comments:
Debugging the test case from bug 82528 with J9, I get the following error in the
log when I tried to display the variables view :

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Array index out of range: 96
        at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntThread.newProperties(AntThread.java)
        at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.receiveMessage(RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.java:92)
        at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.RemoteAntDebugBuildListener$ReaderThread.run(RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.java:59)

I debugged this problem a bit, it appears that the exception is thrown when
trying to read the value of java.fullversion sent by the ant runtime (debug logger).
I tried with a simpler test case, I didn't get the same problem.
Luc does this only happen on J9 or on all VMs on Linux?
I only get this problem when I use J9. I have no problem with the Sun VMs.
*** Bug 85543 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

With the changes released for bug 81418 I believe this is a duplicate.
Could you guys be kind enough to quickly double check for me?
This works for me with the latest code.

Thanks Darinw.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 81418 ***
